tool_description: A easy-to-use API for search cities, states, and countries from around the world.
name: City and State Search API
title: City and State Search API

api_list.name: Cities Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific cities by name. It returns a list of cities that match the specified search query.

api_list.name: City Details
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific city by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/132782"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: States Details

api_list.name: States Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific states by name. It returns a list of states that match the specified search query. You can also set country code or country name to search states in that country only.

api_list.name: States List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of States .It returns basic information about each state, such as name, code, and country. You can also use this endpoint to retrieve a list of states filtered by various criteria such as country.

api_list.name: Country Details
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve detailed information about a specific country by ID or his name.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: It can be country name, iso2 or id.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/IN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-and-state-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Countries Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for specific countries by name. It returns a list of countries that match the specified search query.

api_list.name: Countries List
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of countries.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for locations (cities, states, or countries) by name. It returns a list of locations that match the specified search query.
